title: can someone help me identify this font ?
content:
is this a custom job or can this font be purchased ?  
thanks !

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011012113im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font-2_4312.jpg)

 [‹ Leukemia Font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011012113/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45237 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Hulk movie release date - Digital Sans {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011012113/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45256 "Go to next forum topic")
author: S Vector

comments.content:
Very similar to [this earlier thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011012113/http:/typophile.com/node/45192) today.

- Mike Yanega

I grew up in the ’70s & with a lot of Ken Garland designs. His website here might be helpful.

[http://www.kengarland.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011012113/http:/www.kengarland.co.uk/)

If you start with my font [Ficus Stencil Compressed,](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011012113/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/ficus_stencil_compressed) then remove all the stencil breaks, then using the Advanced Controls, set the horizontal brick size to 0.8 or so, you can get a reasonable approximation.

- Lex
thank you all for your help
